title: John and Dave were the best of friends, they were there for each other through everything.  From girls...

attachments.displayName:
John and Dave were the best of friends, they were there for each other through everything.  From girls to bullies, they were there as either a shoulder to cry on...or an accomplice to hide the bodies. (<Joke) They were very close....so it only seemed appropriate that John would begin feeling some...well more than platonic feelings towards the blonde kid.  Though...there was a small problem with this...John was 85% sure that Dave was a heterosexual.....At least...that's what he thought.

John was spending the night over at Dave's since his dad was out of town for yet another business trip. Dave's apartment had become a second home for the teen over the years.  Dave's older brother even gave him a key.  He lays down on Dave's bed, watching as the other male messes with his turn table.  He took this time to admire everything about Dave.  From the way the blonde looked completely at peace when he was around his music to the way his hair shined in the sunlight that filled the room through the window.  John really did love everything about his best friend....wait....love?  No no no no, It was just an admiration....right? John couldn't help but sigh as he rolls over on the bed to stare at the wall instead.  This was going to be a long night.

((Descriptive Dave needed. :3))
